metadata.title: CVE-2023-5427 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Arm Ltd Bifrost GPU Kernel Driver, Arm LtdValhall GPU Kernel Driver, Arm Ltd Arm 5th Gen GPU Architecture KernelDriver allows a local non-privileged user to make improper GPU processingoperations to gain access to already freed memory.This issue affectsBifrost GPU Kernel Driver: from r44p0 through r45p0; Valhall GPU KernelDriver: from r44p0 through r45p0; Arm 5th Gen GPU Architecture KernelDriver: from r44p0 through r45p0.
